archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0689
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product manager, I want to be able to save the email address and the associated sign-up journey so that customers who drop out can try again at a later date and retrieve their existing information

properties.value: how do you envision retrying the sign-up journey? might be realized by creating a mini-customer entity as soon as user provides an email address. An email could be send to the user with a link to continue the order

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
